Text:
thanks a lot for capturing this show, Ekolb.. really appreciate it.. I usually catch it on TV but there are times when I miss it, such as this episode, and it's really nice to be able to download and watch it if I miss it.

Thanks again for all the great stuff you upload here.
thnx for the show fellow TPBer... any chance you have a murder of crows or access to it.... i missed it and need so badly to see it!
I missed it as well, and still regret it.  But don't worry it will re-appear again  and that time I will capture it, in HD.
